title: SERVAS AT VERDES!
description: We are a small business based in Vienna that produces and sells microgreens. Microgreens are small sprouts, infant versions of known vegetable types like broccoli and arugula. They can be used in a variety of ways, for example on bread, in a salad or as a deluxe garnish.
freshDes: We harvest our microgreens on the day of delivery, so you can be sure that you are getting the freshest possible product.
localDes: We grow our microgreens in Vienna, so you can be sure that you are getting a local product.
nutritionDes: Microgreens are rich in vitamins and minerals, so you can be sure that you are getting a healthy product.
sustainabilityDes: We use only organic seeds and compostable packaging, so you can be sure that you are getting a sustainable product.
gopiDes: Gopi, a passionate microgreens entrepreneur and forward-thinker, who has played a pivotal role in steering our microgreens business towards innovation and growth.
nooaDes: Nooa, a motivated economics student, who is passionate about founding and running successful businesses and has excellent leadership skills.
aboutDes: Our varieties turn every meal into a culinary adventure. Get to know who makes them, and why they are the best in Austria!
img1Des: Nooa and Gopi met in high school, and shared their interest in personal finance, investing and business. These topics started a friendship which then turned into a business partnership. Because we know each other for years already, we make an excellent team and have learned to communicate new ideas and thoughts effectively to each other. Additionally, our different but incredibly valuable skills blend together to make us a team with all necessary requirements to found and run a business. We are both adventurous, outgoing and always open to a new experience or challenge. We think outside the box, or in the case of microgreens, outside of the tray. Partnering with us means not only gaining a new reliable, professional and innovative supplier, but also two new buddies. We look forward to collaborating and getting to know you and your business!
img2Des: We have taken Verdes to the Pre-Incubator of the province of Lower Austria, where we learned crucial soft skills and how to run and pitch a business. At the pitching contest in May 2023, Verdes achieved a top 3 position and we won admittance to a Summer Boot Camp about entrepreneurship, where we continued our learning journey. These experiences showed that seasoned professionals see potential in the business, and they motivated us to continue and follow this path. So, here we are, two students trying to participate in the revolution towards, healthier, more sustainable diets, all the while tending the relationships we form along the way with the same care we tend to our young plants with.
pitchDes: We are a small business based in Vienna that produces and sells microgreens. Microgreens are small sprouts, infant versions of known vegetable types like broccoli and arugula. They can be used in a variety of ways, for example on bread, in a salad or as a deluxe garnish.

faqs.question: What are microgreens?
faqs.answer: Microgreens are young, edible plants that are harvested at an early stage, typically when they have developed their first set of true leaves. These tiny greens are packed with flavor and nutrients, making them a perfect addition to your dishes at a great price.

faqs.question: How can I use microgreens in cooking?
faqs.answer: Microgreens can be used in a variety of ways in your cooking. Add them to salads, sandwiches, wraps, or garnish your favorite dishes with these flavorful greens. They also make a great addition to smoothies or can be used as a topping for soups and omelets. The possibilities are endless!

faqs.question: What are the different sorts of microgreens you offer?
faqs.answer: Our current microgreens selection includes a range of options: We offer broccoli, radish, beetroot, pea shoots, arugula, and coriander (cilantro). Each variety brings a unique flavor profile and nutritional benefits to enhance your culinary experience. In the future, we want to expand our offering.

faqs.question: How long does delivery take?
faqs.answer: Delivery times may vary based on your location and current demand. Generally, we will discuss a suitable delivery schedule with you, adapted to your needs. We strive to reach maximum reliabilty while staying consistent with our quality.
